prompt: Design a nature-inspired onboarding screen with green gradient background (from dark to light green). Place circular illustration at top (30% screen height) using white container filled with green park icon (size 100). Include bold white 'Grow with Us' heading (26px, FontWeight.bold) and light gray subtitle (16px) explaining eco-friendly features. Add teal 'Start Journey' button (12px radius) and white 'Skip' text button at bottom. Use 20px padding, center-align text, and 16px spacing for fresh, organic look.
